metadata.name: Future of ZenAcademy
metadata.description:
I created this art to pay homage to ZenAcademy and its role as a leader in the Web3 space. The academy's focus on education, community building, and empathy has made it a cornerstone of the Web3 community, and I believe it will only continue to grow and flourish in the years to come. Through this NFT, I aim to capture the essence of what makes the Zeneca Academy special, and to celebrate the passion, energy, and spirit that drives this amazing community forward. 
No utility. Just love, empathy, education and supporting one another in web3.  
#ZenFollowZen
